title: Pixel 5 - Another Gap on the front along the screen (Not side gap)
content:
My side gaps are minimal, but I'm wondering about the front screen gap all around.

I have no Pixel 5 to compare to and I have been waiting for a few days but I don't see anyone posting about it.
I compared it to my Pixel 4a, and 4a is completely fine without this issue.

Can others also post some photos of the front gap?
I barely used it since i'm still waiting for my screen protector, it's still siting in the box btw.
It's already collecting dust and they are unclean-able.



I don't want to swap for another phone that might have bigger side gaps if this front gap is normal.
If this is also a defect, I guess i'll return it for another one.

Thank you all!
